system.description:
Makes you look different, changing your appearance including clothing, armor, and equipment. Does not change your body shape but can make you appear taller or shorter.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can change apparent size significantly. At dice count 6, can disguise others. At dice count 9, disguise includes sound and smell. At dice count 12, can appear as specific individuals. At dice count 15, the illusion is perfect and undetectable.
